thread.title: Amal Clooney to represent jailed Reuters reporters

title: Amal Clooney to represent jailed Reuters reporters
text:
Amal Clooney to represent jailed Reuters reporters Thursday, March 29, 2018 - 01:32 
Prominent human rights lawyer Amal Clooney will represent two Reuters reporters jailed in Myanmar, who are accused of possessing secret government papers and face a maximum penalty of 14 years in prison.   
Prominent human rights lawyer Amal Clooney will represent two Reuters reporters jailed in Myanmar, who are accused of possessing secret government papers and face a maximum penalty of 14 years in prison.  //reut.rs/2J6pojw
